name: inbetween
description:
A short puzzlescript game about creating blocks in between other blocks and trying to work around the domino effect that it creates

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=ce9cb61a2ac7559d4b9a7635358f44bf

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=ce9cb61a2ac7559d4b9a7635358f44bf
